description: My great passion is web development. As a junior frontend developer I am constantly dealing with fascinating challenges that not only absorb my attention, but also bring me great satisfaction.
descInformation: Web coder with a passion for soccer, gym and travel. I love movies and mountain hiking. I like to work in a team, but give me some alone time for my creative displays. Always smiling and ready for new challenges!
